snippet: Mohammad Zubair, Pakistan's privatization minister, must oversee the sell-off of 68 companies within the next two years.
lead_paragraph: Mohammad Zubair, Pakistan's privatization minister, must oversee the sell-off of 68 companies within the next two years.

headline.main: The Ultimate Sales Job: Finding Buyers to Save Pakistan
